overview_summary: Both profiled neighbors have no documented stance on development, and neither is publicly active in local affairs. Each appears to have a low community influence, with no supporters or opponents identified among them.

neighbors.name: James & Sunshine Perigen
neighbors.claims: Sunshine “Sunnie” Elaine Perigen was James Perigen’s wife and worked as a Rite Aid store manager in Buchanan ([www.pikefh.com](https://www.pikefh.com/obituaries/sunshine-perigen#:~:text=Sunnie%20was%20born%20December%205%2C,should%20be%20remembered%20as%20a)). Sunshine passed away unexpectedly in 2009 at the age of 32 ([www.pikefh.com](https://www.pikefh.com/obituaries/sunshine-perigen#:~:text=Sunshine%20%E2%80%9CSunnie%E2%80%9D%20Elaine%20Perigen%2C%2032%2C,She%20was)). No public record could be found of James Perigen holding a local office or voicing opinions on development issues【71†】.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via a friendly personal visit and listen to any concerns. Emphasize addressing common questions around property impacts, since they have not taken a public stance.

neighbors.name: Jo Ann Kidder
neighbors.claims: Jo Ann Kidder is listed as an owner of a parcel in Buchanan Township (PIN 11-22-0011-0020-03-3) ([beacon.schneidercorp.com](https://beacon.schneidercorp.com/Search?q=berrien+county#:~:text=11,)) and is not identified in any public local government directory or official role ([www.thebasc.org](https://www.thebasc.org/about#:~:text=About%20,be%20a%20part%20of%20that)). No mentions of her in local news or meeting records were found, suggesting she keeps a private profile in community affairs【49†】.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage one-on-one with courtesy and openness, as she has no known positions. Provide information and encourage questions to understand any personal concerns she may have.
